resources.string: \ CatLog Donate is simply an add-on to the free CatLog, \ meaning you\'ll still need to install that version in order for it to work. \ Thanks for donating! :)

\ While installed, CatLog Donate will unlock the \"Color Scheme\" setting and serve as proof \ that you donated. \ This icon will remove itself from your application \ tray the next time you reboot. Thanks for donating - you are awesome! :)
